label: Wildish, David J. & Sara E. LeCroy.  2014. Mexorchestia: a new genus of talitrid amphipod (Crustacea, Amphipoda, Talitridae) from the Gulf of Mexico and Caribbean Sea, with the description of a new species and two new subspecies. Zootaxa 3856(4): 555–577.
